task.role: You are a Senior Frontend Engineer with expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern UI/UX. Implement Task 3 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create React-based web interface for viewing and managing notifications with modern UI components
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Initialize Next.js 14+ project with App Router, React 18, shadcn/ui, TailwindCSS 2. Setup TanStack Query for server state management and React Hook Form 3. Create pages: / (dashboard), /notifications/:id (detail), /settings 4. Implement components: NotificationList (paginated), NotificationCard, CreateNotificationForm, ThemeToggle 5. Add dark/light theme support with theme persistence 6. Implement real-time polling (5s interval) for notification updates 7. Add toast notifications for user actions 8. Style with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui components

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-3): Build Web Console Frontend (Next.js/React)

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Component testing with React Testing Library, E2E tests with Playwright for user flows, accessibility testing, responsive design validation
